message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's truly one-of-a-kind and I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $1500000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective.  While I'm willing to be flexible, $1200000 is a bit lower than what I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1350000.  This price still reflects the exceptional value of this product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1150000?

Bob, I understand we're getting closer, but $1150000 is still a bit below where I need to be.  I'm willing to drop my price a bit further to $1250000. This is a fair compromise that acknowledges the value of the product while allowing for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's work together to close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1100000?

Bob, I'm aware we're getting close to the end of our negotiations. I'm willing to make a final concession, but I can't go any lower than $1175000. This price reflects a significant compromise on my end and I believe it still offers you a great deal. If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to explore other options.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1050000?
